Seth MacFarlane, creator of Family Guy series, brings his brand that extends the boundaries of humor to theaters for the first time as writer, director and voice actor on Ted. In comedy live action / animation, it tells the story of John Bennett (Mark Wahlberg), a grown man who has to deal with his beloved teddy bear that came to life as the result of a childhood wish ... and who refuses to leave it since.
